tag_list: general-management, technology-enabled-service, offshore, international-operations, union-negotiations, process-improvement, ipo, acquisition
overview:
Seasoned executive who sees the possibilities and makes change happen. Accomplishments include:

• Founder and visionary for world class website and patent pending home management technology platform • Leadership of service delivery team from $3M as venture backed start up to IPO and sale for $250M at 25X EBITDA • Offshoring complex technology enabled business process at 40% improvement in cost. • Executive leadership of company’s first acquisition. • Green field development of two business units that outperformed industry for growth and profitability. • Achievement of high customer satisfaction ratings as measured by Net Promoter score • Established self-funded women’s professional development group aimed at leveraging contribution to company and building more competitive skills Specialties
